title.value: Токсикологическая характеристика нового иммуномоделирующего препарата Янсевит
Toxicological characteristic of new immunomodulatory preparation 'Yansevit'

journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Pepelyaeva, O.P., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus for the first time it is established toxicological property of new drug 'Yansevit'. Yansevit is a complex veterinary drug with immunomodulatory, prebiotic, antioxidant and antiparasitic properties, has a stimulating effect even in small doses, has long physiological consequence, harmless overdose due to the lack of side effects. Median lethal dose (LD50) of the test drug when administered orally to white mice was 9333.4 mg / kg body weight. 'Yansevit' showed to be low toxic (IV class of danger) with LD50 more than 5000 mg/kg and nontoxic for laboratory animals. In course the study of chronic toxicity it was revealed that Yansevit drug does not cause any physiological deviations from the norm in clinical state of the mice receiving the drug in doses 1/10, 1/20 and 1/50 of LD 50 dose for three days. The imunomodulatory drug had no local irritant action to the skin and mucous membranes of laboratory animals and had sensitizing (allergenic) capacity.
